meanings.definition: Maxes: the plural form of 'max', meaning the maximum amount or limit
meanings.sent1: At the store, they always have the maxes of candy on display.
meanings.sent2: She reached the maxes of her patience while waiting in line.
meanings.sent3: The party had so many snacks, it was like a mountain of maxes!
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like the maxes of the ocean, endless and deep.
meanings.sent5: The maxes of the roller coaster made it the most thrilling ride in the park.

meanings.definition: Maxes: third person singular form of the verb 'max', meaning to reach the maximum limit
meanings.sent1: He always maxes out his credit card by the end of the month.
meanings.sent2: The athlete maxes his performance during important competitions.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel maxes its nut collection before winter arrives.
meanings.sent4: Her determination maxes out when faced with challenges.
meanings.sent5: The student maxes his study time before the big exam.
